title: (x) Cyrillic font for Olympics Moscow 1980 - similar to Futura, Nobel {Lex, Yodhananta}
content:
This one is tough because it's in Cyrillic script, so I can't get any suggestion from Identifont of WhatTheFont.

Can anyone identify this font?

Thank you.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1980S\_emblem\_b.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20100911090202/http:/typophile.com/files/1980S_emblem_b_0.png) | 6.23 KB |
author: parutakupiu

comments.content:
Looks like a Cyrillic version of Futura to me.

- Lex

It seems like there is a strong resemblance to Futura, but the M looks like Nobel if I'm not wrong.

Hmmm....most interesting
